comment: ) People think they are following the science but scientists do not all agree that this is safe & effective. Please get the other side before pushing it. How long before they wont let us do anything without it? Taking away our freedom.

comment: ) I am not against vaccinations in general, but to push this on people the way they are for a disease that has a + chance of recovery AND has treatments that would work if they would stop blocking them (HCQ & Ivermectin) is just plain WRONG.
